attributes.action: remove the need for anybody in this country to pay for a television licence now that it has been revealed that our elected representatives have voted in the ability for them to charge that item of annual expenditure to the taxpayer, the same taxpayer who would be sent to jail if he attempted to do the same thing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxpayers paying for MPs and their families to watch television is an immoral abuse and should be stopped immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
